mapper.select: select * from (select count(P_ID) as player from PLAYER ) player,(SELECT count(COACH_ID) as coach FROM COACH) coach,(SELECT count(COM_ID) as com FROM COMPETITION_NOTICE) com,(SELECT count(TEAM_ID) as team FROM TEAM ) team;

SELECT LINK_ID as id,LINK_NAME as linkName,NUM as num,LINK_ADDR as linkAddr,LINK_TYPE as linkType,OPER_DATE as operDate,CREATE_DATE as createDate FROM INDEX_LINK WHERE LINK_TYPE = #{linkType} and STATUS = 1 ORDER BY NUM DESC;
SELECT POLICY_ID as id,POLICY_TIT as title,POLICY_CONTENT as content,OPER_DATE as operDate,CREATE_DATE as createDate FROM INDEX_POLICY where STATUS = 1 order by create_date desc limit 0,7;
